SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.smartfarm.model.animal

Class Animal

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.smartfarm.model.animal.Animal
Direct Known Subclasses:
Chicken, Cow, Pig, Sheep
public abstract class Animal extends Object
Abstract class representing a general animal in the smart farm system. This class encapsulates common attributes and functionalities for all animals such as type, space occupancy, daily food intake, and production strategy.

  • Constructor Details

    • Animal

      public Animal(String type, int takesPlaces, int dailyFoodIntake, ProduceStrategy produceStrategy)
      Constructs an animal with specified characteristics and production strategy.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the animal, e.g., "Cow", "Chicken".
      takesPlaces - The amount of space the animal occupies.
      dailyFoodIntake - The daily amount of food the animal consumes.
      produceStrategy - The strategy defining how the animal produces goods.
